meta.name: description
meta.content: Create a new document and edit with others at the same time -- from your computer, phone or tablet. Get stuff done with or without an internet connection. Use Docs to edit Word files. Free from Google.

meta.name: google-site-verification
meta.title: Google Docs - create and edit documents online, for free.

div.h2: Sign in to continue to Docs

span.a: Sign in with a different account

div.p: One Google Account for everything Google
